ourHistory.title: Our history
ourHistory.description:
Flor√© was born from a conversation between friends, one of those that starts with a coffee and ends with a great idea: to create a place where brunch is not just a meal, but an experience. Inspired by the freshness of local ingredients and a love for gastronomy, we decided to open a space that mixed the best of breakfast and lunch, with that sweet and savory touch we love so much.
In the heart of Neiva, we opened the doors to this corner that many now call their favorite place to start the day with flavor, joy, and warmth.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To provide a unique gastronomic experience through creative, fresh, and personalized brunches, in a cozy atmosphere both on-site and for delivery.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be the reference brunch in the region, expanding our concept of flavor, closeness, and well-being to more places in the country through innovation, quality, and service.

values.title: Our values
values.description:
Passion for cooking - Every dish is made with dedication and love.
Quality and freshness - We use local and natural ingredients.
Closeness with the customer - We want you to feel at home.
Authenticity - We don't follow trends, we create unique experiences.
Innovation - We bet on new things without losing our essence.
